item.title: Using guestfish container image
item.author: Author
item.description: Once in a while, one still needs to get down to a VM-land and dust off some guestfish skills. Like today I got the IPInfusion OcNOS qcow2 image whose devs decided it is best to use VNC console by default. VNC console for a text-based terminal… So along come guestfish commands. It is hugely satisfying to modify the VM images using containers, so here are my two commands to modify GRUB settings.
